availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Patrick O'Brien (Bourbon County, Kentucky, day laborer)

body.p: Bourbon County, Kentucky, day laborer. Native of Ireland. Married to Mary Cass O'Brien in Bourbon County, Kentucky, on September 7, 1858. Father of Thomas O'Brien. Day laborer in Bourbon County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Bourbon County, Eastern Division, p. 679.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Bourbon County Marriages, Film 000216817.
